DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the long-term clinical effectiveness and safety of the PINS Sacral Neuromodulation to patients with refractory Overactive Bladder.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Sacral Neuromodulation for Treatment of Refractory Overactive Bladder (OAB)
DOC.criteria: Age greater than 16 years OAB and/or OAB symptoms Refractory to standard medical therapy 100ml bladder capacity with normal upper urinary tract Good surgical candidate Able to complete study documentation and return for followup evaluation Neurological conditions Stress urinary incontinence OAB symptoms caused by urinary tract infections
